snippet: Novak Djokovic, unhappy with the condition of center court, overcame a frustrating debut on the blue clay at the Madrid Open to reach the third round.
abstract: Novak Djokovic defeats Daniel Gimeno-Traver to reach the third round at the Madrid Open tennis tournament; other results noted.
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic, unhappy with the condition of center court, overcame a frustrating debut on the blue clay at the Madrid Open to reach the third round.

headline.seo: Novak Djokovic Heads to Third Round of Madrid Open
